name: Sand Piles
description:
Sand Piles is a tool that lets you create beautiful computer generated art using the sand pile method

How to Play

Set up the parameters for your sand pile and hit GO to watch it be created

W,S,A,D/UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT: Move the camera

Scroll wheel: Zoom in and out

Space: Reset the camera

Escape/Enter: Pause

Notes

The larger the grid size, the longer it will take for the initial load and generation of your sand pile
